entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
